section.p: Click this news item to visit the BCS information page regarding COVID-19 (Coronavirus)
Bartlett City Schools has released a list of frequently asked questions for our students and families.
Our 2020-2021 open enrollment benefits information is posted on our website. The deadline to complete the paperwork is May 1, 2020.

h1.a: Click here for the Summer 2020 Laptop Checkout Form

section.p: Students returning to BCS for the 2020-2021 school year will have the option to keep their laptop over the summer. If students decide to keep their laptop, students and parents are required to complete the online agreement form.
Updated information has been posted regarding registration for the 2020-2021 school year.

td.a: Health Facts for Families ~ From The Shelby County Health Department

tr.td: IMPORTANT NOTICE: Once you click on any one of the following links, you will leave this website. Please note that we are not responsible for any content posted on these websites or the design of these websites.

div.div:
As we enter into a new school year, I am excited about the many opportunities that lie ahead. We continue to build a strong foundation based on great teachers and staff, a supportive Board and District staff, and an engaged community. With the strong foundation that we have built over the past five years, we continue to shape our District to exemplify excellence in all we do, every day. Our overarching theme, an attitude of excellence, is exhibited daily in the endeavors of our teachers, staff, administration, and students. I know that BCS will continue to build on this excellence in the coming year!
As we look ahead to the 2019-2020 school year, we stay committed to preparing our students for the potential challenges they may face in their academic journey. To assist them in meeting these challenges, we depend on our excellent teaching staff to continue to raise the bar in their classrooms and build on our District's strong foundation. I am proud of our many accomplishments, in our schools and across our district, and I look forward to creating more opportunities for our students to be successful.
Our regional, state, and national accomplishments have been demonstrated in a short amount of time. I am also honored that Bartlett City Schools was ranked #1 in the Top 10 Large Business Workplaces in the Mid-South for 2018, proving that great school systems are built with great people. We should all be proud of the many accomplishments our District has achieved. With our outstanding staff, each bringing their attitude of excellence every day, we can continue to provide a great education that leads to tremendous opportunities for all our students. I am honored to be a member of Bartlett City Schools and I look forward to the many successes that this school year will bring.

div.aside: Dedicated to improving education in Bartlett, TN

div.p:
Bartlett City Schools offers educational and employment opportunities without regard to race, color, creed, national origin, religion, sex, age, or disability and
adheres to the provisions of the Family Education Rights and Privacy Act (FERPA).
Bartlett City Schools is not responsible for questionable or controversial content found through links external to this site.
